commit message: StartScreen and LevelSelectScreen now have all styles in a separate XML file
Removed style from a layout and reinstated level 6s proper time limit
Separated style from layout and renamed the main activitys layout
Size of Go button was too wide on Nexus 7. Now it has a fixed size.
Every activity in the game now controls the STREAM_MUSIC volume. This is because they extend the new VolumeControlActivity
Standardised bundle key names
Organised packages and classes under the game package
Renamed activity package and updated the manifest
Grouped classes into cohesive packages
Pulled out a longer part of the addMeerkat method into another method
Started filling out JavaDoc and added resulting HTML files
More JavaDoc and removed unnecessary exceptions
More javadoc
Initial commit of the Congratulations screen with floating balloon.
Swapped contents of level_select_styles and start_screen_styles because they were in the wrong place. Added a background image to the congratulations screen but it still needs a style
Added background image to congratulations screen
Congratulations screen has animated balloons and a title. Needs balloons hiding before they're animated, title cenetered and more balloons.
Finished balloon animations and screen layout of congratulations screen
Removed unnecessary fillAfter
Made balloons follow each other up faster
Congratulations screen layout and animation is complete
Exits the congratulations screen only after a delay. Back button also exits the screen.
Congraltuations screen is complete. Currently levels are automatically won for testing purposes
Congratulations background fills any screen
Removed debugging code. Levels don't complete themselves any more

Congratulations screen finishes as soon as it's hidden to prevent out of memory errors. Fewer OOM errors were seen on the emulator but they still happened occasionally. Can't reproduce on a physical device (Tested on XPeria Miro, Nexus 7, Galaxy S3)
Added a pause screen when the menu button is pressed. TODO: add a pause button to the game's interface
Added pause button and linked it into the pause functionality
Adjusted level end layout
Adjusted level end layout
Cleaned up manifest file
Changed package names to match new domain
updated incorrect package name for congratulations screen
Fixed a bug where the pause screen is shown on top of the level select screen if the phone's display is switched off and on while the game is paused
